paper.title: The best m-term approximation and greedy algorithms

author.org: Department of Mathematics, University of South Carolina, Columbia, SC 29208, USA

paper.abstract: Two theorems on nonlinear \(m\)‐term approximation in \(L_p ,\;1 ‐term approximation to any \(f \in L_p\) can be realized by the following simple greedy type algorithm. Take the expansion \(f = \sum\nolimits_I {c_I \psi _I }\) and form a sum of \(m\) terms with the largest \(\left\| {c_I \psi _I } \right\|_p\) out of this expansion.
